creator: Terrainspotter
descriptionHtml:
Tired of the same boring trips? If your current friends are not enough then this social trip companion finder will help you find your perfect travel buddy!

Travel Buddy is a Social travel app. It is a chance to find friends worldwide, visit a place of your dream and find a travel partner or a local guide when you are travelling. If you are planning to travel then Travel Buddy App can help you find someone to travel with, having similar Itinerary with you.

HOW IT WORKS:

- Download & Register on the Travel Buddy App.
- Build your detailed profile by adding Cover Photos, Details about yourself
- Add your upcoming trips and find a travel buddy who seems to be best for your next tour
- Connect with new travellers from your location or any location across the world.
- Travel the World -Find any place for travelling, pack your things and go explore together.
- See pictures from fellow travellers and ask about destinations to Locals
- Chat with travel mates, meet someone to travel with, trip together and give best ratings and reviews.
- Meet your travel companions during your trip, upload your Pub crawling trip photos and make memories.

Features:
- A social feed to post travel photos, videos, stories or advice.
- Nearby Travelers on the map
- Ask Travel Queries from Locals
- Travel Connect: Many local travel deals, tours & activities.
- Become a Verified Traveler and Travel Better!
- Organise or discover meetups, travel community events etc.
- Plan trip together, shop, go out, eat, explore beaches or natural trails, or just hang out.
- Visit your dream destinations and receive adventure travel companions where you are.
- Find your travel mates for backpacking, caving, trekking, an upcoming business trip, convention or unite with new friends for a short break away.
- Forum of travellers to help each other, where you can ask a question and get travel tips, advises for your upcoming trip

Become strong and independent with this new travel app. Post on the app about your trip and share past travel experience on this Social Travel App. You can share about tour destinations you have visited so far or your road trip experiences, provide a travel guide and tips to help other travellers on how to get there, places to visit, best time to trekking and best place to stay and signature dishes to try out or just blog about your dream travel destinations you want to visit in future and your travel resolutions for the year.

We have put together some useful tips to help you feel organised and relaxed ahead of your trip. Get Suggestions on tourists nearby to connect with via geolocation grouping on the app.
descriptionShort: Find Travel Buddies, See Nearby Travelers, Ask Locals about destinations.

- UI enhancements
- Performance improvements

title: Travel Buddy : Find Travel Buddies Locally

creator: Terrainspotter
descriptionHtml:
Make special travel memories with Travel Buddy. We are here to help you travel like a local. Meet local travelers from your desired destination, chat with them to know the place, and plan unique trips. It’s a trusted community of travelers who can uplift your vacation experiences to a new level with their advice and guidance. 👫

With the Travel Buddy app, you can couch-surf with your local guide. It is always better to discover a place with a local travel companion who knows the place better than any travel agent or website. 🛫

It’s a great social app which you can use to meet new people, interact with fellow travelers, make friends and find local guides. 💬

Travel Buddy also organizes online & offline travel events.

Solo Traveling Made Easy

This app is a blessing for solo travelers. You can plan your much-awaited solo trip without any tension as you have friends waiting in this social travel platform to guide you to take an unforgettable trip. So, strap your backpack, find the solace of your wandering soul and indulge in some great experiences with Travel Buddy.

Local Itinerary Amongst us

We travel to break the monotony of our sometimes mundane life. So, this is the time to break the customs of ordinary travel planning as well! Ditch those popular crowded spots and explore virgin beauty ignored by websites and apps’ recommendation lists.

Connect With Locals And Indulge In Your Favorite Activity

• Enjoy the bliss of finding the local experiences guided by native experts.
• You can taste the best local cuisines on the recommendation of your partner.
• With the help of your travel pal find the finest shops to get the souvenirs at the best price.
• Interact with the locals because now you have the support of your travel buddy, thus language will also not be a barrier.

Showcase Your Home Town To Become a Local Guide

Take the pride to showcase those hidden gems of your home town. As a local travel companion, you can meet new people like solo travelers, backpackers, families, couples, senior citizens or corporate groups.

Grow Your Business With Us

The App offers some amazing features to Travel Agents and Service providers. Become a verified Travel provider and get genuine leads for your business. You can connect with travelers coming to your city. Offer your service and become a travel planner.

If You Are A Tourist, Then You Should

• Check out the locals for the desired location
• Select the tour companion based on their ratings and reviews
• Use filters like gender, age, type of user, interests, location, activities and more
• Ask the travel buddy about the itinerary, local food, weather and many other things
• Get answers from several other buddies by using #(hashtag) tagging
• Check out the map view feature to find out the nearest travel buddy
• Post on the app about the trip to receive recommendations from your travel mates

If You Are A Local, Then You Should

• Specify the “location” & “favorite places” while registering in the App
• Improve your travel profile with photos of your travel experiences and an impressive bio
• Engage in conversations with travellers to create good reputation and in turn get more profile visits and enquiries
• Explain what all activities and facilities you can offer as a tour guide
• Reply to Traveller’s query quickly and get the travel enquiry listed on your profile
• Share the languages you can speak and understand
• Check the number of tourists looking for the location
• Review and rate users and vice versa

Join the Party 🎉

Give solace to your nomadic self by finding the local travel partners like never before. Whether you are traveling alone or with family or friends, this community will help you to find the real joy of vacationing far from the madding crowd. 🏖️

Follow @beatravelbuddy on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter & LinkedIn. 😎
descriptionShort: Find Local Travel Buddies, Chat With Them, Plan a Trip, Meet and Share Stories

Download. Explore. Connect. Meet. Share. Earn. Repeat.

Introducing, the best travel app around the world 🌍, designed to bring people, their passions for travel, and places together.

Whether you are looking for a solo travel experience 🏂, backpacking 🧗 taking a vacation with family & friends👪 or going on an official trip🧑‍💼, this one-of-a-kind social networking platform 📲 is nothing short of a paradise on earth!

- Answering travel queries

We are all about making your travel agency’s journey easier! 🎯

What's more?! Subscribe to join our exclusive online marketplace platform🛬 enjoy a 0% commission rate for the leads you generate!💸🤑
Connect with as many travelers in the best travel partner apps, chat without limitation, and use advanced search filters 🕵️‍♀️to generate unlimited leads. 💫

Join the Travel Buddy, the travelling and fast growing community!!

Travel Buddy is a 21st-century app for travelling📲 for all your modern travel needs, whether you are trying to find backpackers online🎒 arranging solo travel meetups💃 or family vacationing extravagantly, this is the best app to plan a trip!

Travel Buddy’s online social network allows you to relax and enjoy the excursions with yourself or with the ones you want to travel👬 without any hassle. 🤗
